entities.name: waiter
entities.description: The waiter is described as making his way around the edge of the crowded dance floor. This suggests that he is a person who works at the wedding and is responsible for serving food or drinks to the guests.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being danced with by Hermione in the middle of the dance floor. He is also the one that Harry wants to tell about Gregorovitch.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is a location or place that Harry wants to tell Ron about. It is not clear what this location is, but it seems to be important for the story.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being danced with by Ron in the middle of the dance floor.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as dancing with Fred and George's friend Lee Jordan. Harry is watching her from a distance.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as being friends with George and having a friend named Lee Jordan who is dancing with Ginny.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as being friends with Fred and having a friend named Lee Jordan who is dancing with Ginny.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is mentioned as being friends with Fred and George and dancing with Ginny.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is watching Ginny dance from a distance and seems to be feeling resentful about a promise he made to Ron.

relationships.description: Harry wants to tell Ron about Gregorovitch. This is mentioned in the text as Harry's motivation for finding Ron.
Ron is dancing with Hermione in the middle of the dance floor. This is mentioned in the text as a distraction for Harry who wants to talk to Ron.
